bibl.title: A Legionary Veteran and his Family.
James Frank Gilliam, Roman Army Papers
bibl.author: Gilliam, James Frank

bibl.note: Reproduit de: BASP 8 (1971) pp. 39-44. P. Yale Inv. 1545 (= S.B. XII, 10788). Considers the filiation of the veteran and what may be concluded about his origin and family.
Gilliam James Frank, A Legionary Veteran and his Family.
James Frank Gilliam, Roman Army Papers = Mavors Roman Army Researches. 2 (Amsterdam, 1986) pp. 335-340.
